api_list.api_description: Get information about a user by their user_id.

required_parameters.name: user_id
required_parameters.description: The hex ID of the barter.vg user

api_list.api_description: Retrieves all entries in a given category.

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: The category to retrieve entries from.

query: Can you provide information about the user with ID 'a0' from Barter.vg? Also, retrieve all entries in the 'creatures' category from the Hyrule Compendium.
